original_text: You have become guilty by the blood that you have shed, and defiled by the idols that you have made, and you have brought your days near, the appointed time of your years has come. Therefore I have made you a reproach to the nations, and a mockery to all the countries.
korean_text: 네가 흘린 피로 말미암아 죄가 있고 네가 만든 우상으로 말미암아 스스로 더럽혔으니 네 날이 가까웠고 네 연한이 찼도다 그러므로 내가 너로 이방의 능욕을 받으며 만국의 조롱 거리가 되게 하였노라

sentences.original_text: You have become guilty by the blood
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 흘린 피로 인하여 유죄가 되었다

sentences.original_text: and you have brought your days near
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 너희의 날들을 다가오게 했다

sentences.original_text: the appointed time of your years has come
Therefore I have made you a reproach to the nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내가 너를 열국에게 조롱거리가 되게 하였다

sentences.original_text: and a mockery to all the countries
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 나라에게 비웃음거리가 되게 하였다
